title: Focused Cardiac Ultrasound (FoCUS) Simulator-Based Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cardiac physiology and ultrasound principles comprehension
context.additional_context: Self-directed curriculum emphasizing deliberate practice and scaffolded learning support

learning_goals: Learners can accurately manipulate FoCUS probes to acquire standard four echocardiographic views with 80% accuracy
Learners can determine the presence or absence of cardiac structural abnormalities in acquired images with 75% accuracy using real-time feedback provided by simulators
Learners demonstrate the competency to independently execute FoCUS examination procedures by passing three consecutive unassisted performance assessments in a simulated environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
